name: Between Two Worlds DEMO
description:
--- BETWEEN TWO WORLDS ---

This game is being developed over the course of 5 days as part of the Weekly Game Jam week 148 (theme of Mirror)

After finding yourself trapped in a seemingly normal living room, you must search your surroundings for a way out. Use your mouse to investigate.

Inspirations for this game include Samsara Room and Year Walk (Check them both out on Steam!)
